Description: Slack is a messaging app for teams.
Name: Slack

Methods.Name: auth.test
Methods.Description: This method checks authentication and tells you who you are.

Methods.Name: File Shared
Methods.Description: Listens to Slack for when a file is shared.

Methods.Name: File Created
Methods.Description: Listens to Slack for when a file is created.

Methods.Name: Post Message
Methods.Description: Post a message to a public channel, private channel, or direct message/IM channel.

Methods.Name: React to Message
Methods.Description: Add a reaction to a posted message.

Methods.Name: Post Rich Text Message
Methods.Description: Post a message to a public channel, private channel, or direct message/IM channel. It is recommenced to use the "Block JSON" request field.

Methods.Name: List Groups
Methods.Description: List all groups (private channels) in the team.

Methods.Name: Archive Group
Methods.Description: Archive a group (private channel) in this team.

Methods.Name: Add Member To Group
Methods.Description: This method is used to invite a user to a private channel. The calling user must be a member of the private channel.

Methods.Name: Create Group
Methods.Description: Create a new group (private channel) in this team.

Methods.Name: Delete File
Methods.Description: Delete a file from Slack. User scope files:write required. The authenticated user needs to be a Slack admin to remove files other than their own.

Methods.Name: List Files
Methods.Description: List Files from Slack.

Methods.Name: List New Files
Methods.Description: List Files from Slack created since the last successful run date.

Methods.Name: Download File
Methods.Description: Download a File from Slack, using the Download URL provided in the Get/List File step.

Methods.Name: Get File
Methods.Description: Get a File from Slack.

Methods.Name: Add Members To Channel
Methods.Description: This method is used to invite users to a channel. The calling user must be a member of the channel.

Methods.Name: Archive Channel
Methods.Description: Archive a channel in this team.

Methods.Name: Create Channel
Methods.Description: Create a new channel in this team.

Methods.Name: List Channels
Methods.Description: List all channels in the team.

Methods.Name: Get Channel By Name
Methods.Description: Retrieves a Channel by its name.  Leaves through the True Exit if the Channel exists, else through the False Exit.

Methods.Name: Add Member
Methods.Description: Invite a member to join your Slack team.

Methods.Name: List Members
Methods.Description: List all members in the team.

Methods.Name: Add Member
Methods.Description: Invite a member to join your Slack team.

Methods.Name: Remove Member
Methods.Description: Remove a member from your Slack team.

Methods.Name: List Members
Methods.Description: List users in your Slack team.

MetaTile: Slack Integration - Communications & Messaging Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Automatically make sure your team, clients & suppliers are kept in the loop by integrating Slack with your vital business applications. Build your own custom workflows with Cyclr's automation builder.
